body_html:
I'm quite sure this is related to bazelbuild/bazel#2752. Until that fix percolates through the releases: I got the build to move on without tensorboard by deleting line https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD#L162, i. e.

"//tensorflow/tensorboard",

I also tried changing the 239 occurrences of PYTHON_?(BIN)(ARY)?_?(PATH)? ?= in 132 files, plus the other 196 occurrences in 108 files in /tmp/_bazel/, but bazel apparently checks hashes for the files it generates.

"//tensorflow/tensorboard",
I also tried changing the 239 occurrences of PYTHON_?(BIN)(ARY)?_?(PATH)? ?= in 132 files, plus the other 196 occurrences in 108 files in /tmp/_bazel/, but bazel apparently checks hashes for the files it generates.
body:
I'm quite sure this is related to https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/2752. Until that fix percolates through the releases: I got the build to move on without tensorboard by deleting line https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD#L162, i. e.

```"//tensorflow/tensorboard",```

I also tried changing the 239 occurrences of ```PYTHON_?(BIN)(ARY)?_?(PATH)? ?=``` in 132 files, plus the other 196 occurrences in 108 files in ```/tmp/_bazel/```, but bazel apparently checks hashes for the files it generates.
